content: *note archive link above is in english only sizes sack 20 in 51 cm around x 24 in 61 cm long cap to fit average newborn to 3 months bernat baby cakes 100 g/3 5 oz 185 m/203 yds 43205 shamrock mc - 1 ball 43201 honey dew a - 1 ball 43007 ice cream b - 1 ball circular knitting needles size 4 5mm us7 16 40 5cm long - for sack double pointed needles set of 4 size 4 5mm us7 - for cap gauge 20 sts x 26 row = 4 / 10cm in stocking stitch
